name: Signed A.
description:
A Psychological Horror  Puzzle game with hard hitting reality

PLAYTHROUGH by YouTuber L Squared LIVE - Community Post Below

Playthrough Link

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4tqriWDdfys&feature=emb_logo

I take you to a place far from home, but a place further from reality. I let you view life as normal but augmented to fit your mind. I am viewed as sane, but what I view as sane will drive you deeper down the endless spiral. Because of me you're just existing, but from time to time you fly. No one is safe from me. 

Signed A.

Dev

Dan Spence

Created as a solo project for Epic Games Mega Jam 2019
